tool_description: Simplify your application by just having 1 endpoint for all types of webhooks / requests
name: Universal / Easy Webhooks
title: Universal / Easy Webhooks

api_list.name: Universal Webhook
api_list.description:
Easy-to-use endpoint to send the webhooks with the necessary data
It's easy to use and has fixed requests / responses, so you have an easy time, implementing a webhook feature.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://universal-easy-webhooks.p.rapidapi.com/send"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "universal-easy-webhooks.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://universal-easy-webhooks.p.rapidapi.com/send"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "universal-easy-webhooks.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
